creator: ZMenGames
descriptionHtml:
Zen Launcher aims to unite most daily actions to work via it's search. Aiming to keep usage of phone or tablet as Zen as possible. No need to open different app for contacts, settings, calling, messaging, alarm, calculator etc.

App is based on open source project, source code will be available at some point.

Some recently added features:

* Alarm clock. Type alarm, alarm 5, or alarm 7:00 to set alarms. Alarms that are set are visible in bell icon. Alarm 5 feed dog will include given "feed dog" when alarm goes off.
* Lock feature after some time. Type lock 5, select 5 minutes or 5 hours.
* Notification bubble support, also for contacts if name is same in contacts.
* Supports multiple widgets. Long press to configure.
* Lock device with proximity sensor or double click.
* Blue light filter from 3 dots menu.
* Wifi on/off toggle from long press menu.
* Airplane mode shortcut from long press menu.
* Layout storing to Google Drive, also widgets.
* Direct dial or message to contact also with social media apps. Long pressing dial or msg button pops up menu to select app to handle event. Supports Signal, WhatsApp and Messenger.
* Contact's can be searched by its title or company
* Badge support (limited devices). Shows number of unread messages from your favorite apps.
* Button to quickly see apps that have unread notifications
* Improved calculator, can handle more complex equations.
* Contacts can be shown separately in own list.
* Apps can be shown in grid view.
* gesture support
* BONUS: Zen Flashlight widget included in the app!
descriptionShort: Zen Launcher

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Fix out of memory error when icon cache enabled by limiting it's size to max 1/8th of available memory.
Update screen when removing app from grid view.
Optimizing reaction to deletion or addition of some app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Fix issue with scroll getting stuck occasionally
- Fix issues with web shortcuts
- Added option to share web shortcut

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* rebase features from KISS:
* adaptive icon backgrounds
* customizable themes

Other:
* improvements here and there
* Clear memorycache onl when needed (performance improvement)
* Option to enable and disable contact masks (has performance impact when enabled, no cache yet).
* Some translations.

* gesture support
* BONUS: Zen Flashlight widget included in the app!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Support for searching contacts with email address. Email address is shown under phone number if title / company is not set

- Bug fixes.

* Direct dial or message to contact also with social media apps. Long pressing dial or msg button pops up menu to select app to handle event. Supports Signal, WhatsApp and Messenger.
* Contact's can be searched by its title or company
* Badge support (limited devices). Shows number of unread messages from your favorite apps.
* Button to quickly see apps that have unread notifications
* Improved calculator, can handle more complex equations.
* Contacts can be shown separately in own list.
* Apps can be shown in grid view.
* gesture support
* BONUS: Zen Flashlight widget included in the app!
descriptionShort: Launcher with intelligent search for apps, contacts, settings, web links etc.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Android target SDK update

title:
Zen Launcher
2024-08-22@e9a2438f

creator: ZMenGames
descriptionHtml:
Zen Launcher aims to unite most daily actions to work via it's search. Aiming to keep usage of phone or tablet as Zen as possible. No need to open different app for contacts, settings, calling, messaging, alarm, calculator etc.

Based on open source project, code available at:
https://github.com/krasanen/zen-launcher

Some recently added features:

* QR and Barcode reader. Added to favorites by default.
* Alarm clock. Type alarm, alarm 5, or alarm 7:00 to set alarms. Alarms that are set are visible in bell icon. Alarm 5 feed dog will include given "feed dog" when alarm goes off.
* Lock feature after some time. Type lock 5, select 5 minutes or 5 hours.
* Notification bubble support, also for contacts if name is same in contacts.
* Supports multiple widgets. Long press to configure.
* Lock device with proximity sensor or double click.
* Blue light filter from 3 dots menu.
* Wifi on/off toggle from long press menu.
* Airplane mode shortcut from long press menu.
* Layout storing to Google Drive, also widgets.
* Direct dial or message to contact also with social media apps. Long pressing dial or msg button pops up menu to select app to handle event. Supports Signal, WhatsApp and Messenger.
* Contact's can be searched by its title or company
* Badge support (limited devices). Shows number of unread messages from your favorite apps.
* Button to quickly see apps that have unread notifications
* Improved calculator, can handle more complex equations.
* Contacts can be shown separately in own list.
* Apps can be shown in grid view.
* gesture support
* BONUS: Zen Flashlight widget included in the app!
descriptionShort: Launcher with intelligent search for apps, contacts, settings, web links etc.
